snippet: The Obie Award-winning New York theater company Clubbed Thumb has announced its lineup for the 17th annual Summerworks festival.
abstract: New York theater company Clubbed Thumb announces its lineup for the 17th annual Summerworks festival in June 2012.
lead_paragraph: The Obie Award-winning New York theater company Clubbed Thumb has announced its lineup for the 17th annual Summerworks festival.
